paper_title.en: Enantioselective determination of bromoisovalerylurea by liquid chromatography on chiral stationary phase in reversed- or normal-phase partition mode

description.en: Bromoisovalerylurea (bromvalerylurea) is a sedative-hypnotic given orally as a racemate. Enantiomers of this drug could be separated by high-performance liquid chromatography on the three chiral stationary phases (a vancomycin-bonded, beta-cyclodextrin derivative-bonded, or urea derivative-bonded phase). Biological fluids of human subjects who had ingested toxic or therapeutic doses of the racemate were chromatographed after liquid-liquid extraction. The (+)-enantiomer concentration was almost equal to the (-)-enantiomer concentration in the serum of one overdosed patient. In all the other subjects, the (+)-enantiomer was less than the (-)-enantiomer in their sera and saliva. The data suggest that the drug is absorbed non-stereoselectively from the gasrrointestinal trace and eliminated from the blood stereoselectively. Copyright (C) 2000 John Wiley Br Sons, Ltd.

paper_title.ja: わが国における抗痴呆薬の開発の現状―Donepezilに続くもの―
送択的セロチニン再取り込み阻害薬塩酸パロキセチンの肝機能・腎機能低下のうつ病患者における薬物動態試験
脳検診外来受診者における高次脳機能について

description.ja: 脳検診外来受診者158名(平均年齢59.3歳)を対象に施行した頭部MRI検査,Bender Gestalt Test(BGT),Center for Epidemiologic Studies Depression Scale(CES-D)等の各種神経心理検査の結果から1,頭部MRI所見および各神経心理検査との関連性,2自覚的物忘れの程度と神経心理検査成績との関連性について検討した.MRI異常検出率は48.1%であり,各神経心理検査においてMRI異常出現率に有意差は認めなかった.物忘れの自覚の有無,さらに物忘れの自覚度得点高低と各種神経心理検査の成績で,有意の相関を示す者はなかったが,CES-D陽性群で物忘れ自覚得点が有意に高かった

低濃度AF64A脳室内投与ラットにおける記憶学習障害に関する研究-T字型迷路学習試験およびChAT活性の測定による検討-(共著)
paper_title.en: Working Memory Impairment Induced by Intra-ventricular Injection of a Low Dose AF64A (Ethylcholine Aziridinium Ion) : Analysis of T-Maze Learning Test and Brain ChAT (Choline Acetyltransferase) Activity in Rats

description.ja: 本研究で著者らは,選択的アセチルコリン系阻害物質であるAF64Aを低濃度で脳室内投与したラットにおいて, T字型迷路学習試験を行い,痴呆モデルとしての有用性を検討した。さらに,16か月齢の加齢ラットにおいても同様の試験を行い,正常加齢群と痴呆モデルとの相違を比較検討した。その結果,低濃度AF64A脳室内投与と遅延見本合わせ課題を用いたT字型迷路学習試験の組み合わせは,ヒトの痴呆疾患における作業記憶障害の評価に通ずるものであり,薬物の薬効評価に利用できるモデルであると結論した。
description.en: Learning abilities for working memory in both AF64A-treated and aged rats were examined in a delayed matching-to-sample paradigm using a T-maze. After conducting 240 acquisition trials, 24 young rats received bilateral injections of either AF64A (3nmol per side) (N=8, 4 rats died) or saline, into the lateral ventricles (N=12). Approximately 4 weeks after the injection procedure, reacquisition trials were conducted in both of the groups to assess the influence of the drug. Six aged rats were only exposed to the acquisition session. After the behavioral experiments were completed, the rats were sacrificed at the age of 30〜34 weeks for younger rats, and at the age of 72〜76 weeks for the aged rats, and neurochemical analysis was performed. Choline acetyltransferase (ChAT) activity was measured as a marker for the cholinergic system in the frontal cortex, striatum and hippocampus. The AF64A-treated rats revealed remarkable disturbances in the performance throughout 240 reacquisition trials, while the aged rats were able to learn the T-maze task, although it took many more trials (207.7±44.0) than were required with younger controls (136.5±35.5) (p<0.05). ChAT activity was significantly decreased in the hippocampus of the AF64A-treated rats up to 39% of controlled value (p<0.01), while the activities in the aged rats were moderately and noticeably reduced in the striatum (30%) and hippocampus (33%), (p<0.05). Based on the above findings, we concluded that the combination of a low-dose AF64A injection into the ventricles of rat brain with a delayed matching-to-sample paradigm in T-maze is an excellent model with which to evaluate the working memory disturbance seen in Alzheimer-type dementia in human beings.
